pr_title: Remove dependency on a wicket class from jdbcconfig.internal.ConfigDatabase

timeline.bodyText: Is it correct to remove the " - 1" here?  If localPropertyName is "a.b.c.d", then the backPropName values should be "a.b.c", "a.b" and "a".
timeline.author: sikeoka

replies.author: groldan

replies.bodyText: Running the old code on "a.b.c.d" would get [ "a.b.c", "a.b", "a", "" ] while your code gets [ "a.b.c.d", "a.b.c", "a.b", "a" ].  The empty string in the old code is useless and shouldn't be there.  Adding back the "- 1" to your changes gets the desired result of [ "a.b.c", "a.b", "a" ].
replies.author: sikeoka

replies.bodyText: you're correct. Should be fixed now, thanks.
replies.author: groldan

timeline.message:
Remove dependency on a wicket class from jdbcconfig.internal.ConfigDatabase

Removing usage of wicket's `Strings` utility class from jdbcconfig's
internal code, so it the module can/could be used even if web-core is
excluded as a dependency.
Remove unused dependency on com.ning:compress-lzf from gs-jdbcconfig
Remove unused dependency on com.ning:compress-lzf from gs-jdbcconfig
